title: Leftmost Column with at Least a One
description:
You are given a binary matrix with rows sorted in non-decreasing order.
Implement a function to return the index of the leftmost column with at least a 1 in it.
If no such column exists, return -1.

The matrix is only accessible via a BinaryMatrix interface with the following methods:
- get(row, col): returns the value at that cell (0 or 1)
- dimensions(): returns [rows, cols]

arguments.name: binaryMatrix
arguments.description: An instance of BinaryMatrix containing the binary matrix.
